name: Investors Real Estate Trust
description: Investors Real Estate Trust (IRET) is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on the ownership, operation, and development of multifamily residential properties. Founded in 1970, IRET has established itself as a trusted name in the real estate sector, particularly in the Midwest and upper Great Plains regions of the United States. The company’s portfolio includes a diverse range of apartment communities that provide quality living spaces for residents. With a mission to enhance the resident experience through responsive management and community engagement, IRET aims to create sustainable and vibrant communities. The company emphasizes strategic growth through acquisitions and development, ensuring that properties are well-maintained and reflect the needs of modern tenants. IRET's commitment to sustainability encompasses energy-efficient building practices and initiatives to reduce its environmental footprint. The company is also dedicated to delivering value to its shareholders through effective capital management and consistent dividend payments. IRET continues to leverage its extensive industry experience and local market knowledge to identify growth opportunities and optimize its property management strategies.

seo.meta_title: Investors Real Estate Trust | Multifamily Residential REIT
seo.meta_description: Explore Investors Real Estate Trust (IRET), a leading multifamily residential REIT committed to quality living spaces and sustainable community development.

faq.question: What does IRET specialize in?
faq.answer: IRET specializes in the ownership, operation, and development of multifamily residential properties.

faq.question: Where is IRET headquartered?
faq.answer: IRET is headquartered in Minot, North Dakota, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of IRET?
faq.answer: Mark O. Decker Jr. is the CEO of Investors Real Estate Trust.
